meanings.definition: A person who makes or repairs shoes.
meanings.sent1: The shoemakers in town are skilled at crafting leather shoes.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is one of the shoemakers who work at the local shop.
meanings.sent3: The shoemakers had a friendly competition to see who could make the fanciest pair of boots.
meanings.sent4: The shoemakers' hands moved like lightning as they transformed raw materials into wearable art.
meanings.sent5: The shoemakers' workshop was filled with the rich scent of leather and the sound of hammers on anvils.
